types.html:
queue de poisson f (plural queues de poisson)

  1. (figuratively) Swerve in front of another car and deliberately brake to hinder or startle the driver behind.
  2. Used other than figuratively or idiomatically: see queue,‎ poisson.
trans: Swerve in front of another car and deliberately brake to hinder or startle the driver behind.
Used other than figuratively or idiomatically: see queue,‎ poisson.

title: queue de poisson
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /kø də pwa.sɔ̃/
